md:
giải nghĩa từ "purchase" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Purchase (verb)
	+ Meaning: To buy something, especially in a formal or official way.
	+ Vietnamese: Mua, mua lại
	+ Example sentence: The company will purchase the new equipment next month.
	+ Related words: buy, acquire, obtain
	+ Synonyms: acquire, buy, procure

* Purchase (noun)
	+ Meaning: The act of buying something.
	+ Vietnamese: Việc mua, mua hàng
	+ Example sentence: The purchase of the new house was a big decision.
	+ Related words: buying, acquisition, procurement
	+ Synonyms: acquisition, procurement, buying

Note: The verb "purchase" can also mean to gain or obtain something, especially through effort or hard work. For example: "She purchased a reputation as a skilled artist through her dedication and talent."
